h2_title: In the Crouching Tiger Temple Cellar
content: Fight your way through the tunnel to find a cave path leading outside to a steep one-way slope. Slide down the rest of the way, and you’ll come up to a Shrine for the **Crouching Tiger Temple’s Cellar**. In the far corner of the cellar, you’ll find a familiar friendly face - the Xu Dog you helped get medicine recipes for!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xu_Dog_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Xu Dog Questline', specifically from the subsection 'In the Crouching Tiger Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
Fight your way through the tunnel to find a cave path leading outside to a steep one-way slope. Slide down the rest of the way, and you’ll come up to a Shrine for the **Crouching Tiger Temple’s Cellar**. In the far corner of the cellar, you’ll find a familiar friendly face - the Xu Dog you helped get medicine recipes for!
